mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, title, CONVERT(content USING euckr) as content, writer_id, password, hits, reg_type, header_type, file_size AS fileSize, file_name_origin AS fileNameOrigin, file_name_upload AS fileNameUpload, file_type AS fileType, inpdt, moddt FROM fa_notice WHERE 1=1 AND header_type = #{notice.headerType} ORDER BY inpdt DESC

SELECT notice_no, title, CONVERT(content USING euckr) as content, writer_id, password, hits, reg_type, header_type, file_size AS fileSize, file_name_origin AS fileNameOrigin, file_name_upload AS fileNameUpload, file_type AS fileType, inpdt, moddt FROM fa_notice WHERE notice_no = #{notice.noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fa_notice (writer_id, password, title, content, file_size, file_name_origin, file_name_upload, file_type, header_type, content_open) VALUES( #{notice.writerId}, #{notice.password}, #{notice.title}, #{notice.content},#{notice.fileSize}, #{notice.fileNameOrigin}, #{notice.fileNameUpload}, #{notice.fileType}, #{notice.headerType}, #{notice.contentOpen})
